00096 inline MultiSearchNotice::MultiSearchNotice()
00097 {
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline
00101 MultiSearchNotice::MultiSearchNotice(uint32 stringIndex, uint32 endOfItems)
00102       : m_strIdx(stringIndex), m_endOfItems(endOfItems)
00103 {
00104 }
00105 
00106 inline uint32
00107 MultiSearchNotice::getStringIndex() const
00108 {
00109    return m_strIdx;
00110 }
00111 
00112 inline uint32
00113 MultiSearchNotice::getNbrItems(const MultiStringSearch* mss) const
00114 {
00115    return  mss->getEndOffset(this) - mss->getStartOffset(this);
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 inline const SearchMapItem*
00120 MultiSearchNotice::getItem(const MultiStringSearch* mss,
00121                            uint32 offset) const
00122 {
00123    MC2_ASSERT( offset < getNbrItems(mss) );
00124    return mss->getSearchMapItem(mss->getStartOffset(this)+offset);
00125 }
00126 
00127 inline uint8
00128 MultiSearchNotice::getNameNbr(const MultiStringSearch* mss,
00129                               uint32 offset) const
00130 {
00131    MC2_ASSERT( offset < getNbrItems(mss) );
00132    return mss->getNameNbr(mss->getStartOffset(this)+offset);
00133 }
00134 
00135 inline uint8
00136 MultiSearchNotice::getWordNbr(const MultiStringSearch* mss,
00137                               uint32 offset) const
00138 {
00139    MC2_ASSERT( offset < getNbrItems(mss) );
00140    return mss->getWordNbr(this, offset);
00141 }
00142 
00143 inline uint8
00144 MultiSearchNotice::getStringPartMask(const MultiStringSearch* mss,
00145                                      uint32 offset) const
00146 {
00147    MC2_ASSERT( offset < getNbrItems(mss) );
00148    return mss->getStringPartMask(this, offset);
